item.label: AB: $ADDON[script.artwork.beef 32410]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:script.artwork.beef) + [StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo)]

item.label: AB: $ADDON[script.artwork.beef 32411]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:script.artwork.beef) + [StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo)]

item.label: AB: $ADDON[script.artwork.beef 32427]
item.visible: Skin.HasSetting(enablecontext:script.artwork.beef.debug) + [StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, season) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, season)]

item.label: AB: $ADDON[script.artwork.beef 32430]
item.visible: Skin.HasSetting(enablecontext:script.artwork.beef.debug) + [StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo)]

extension.summary: Automatically adds extra artwork for your media.
extension.description: Artwork Beef automatically adds extra artwork for TV shows and movies into your library. It grabs them from wonderful web services and the file system.
extension.disclaimer: Artwork sources: fanart.tv, TheTVDB.com, The Movie Database, TheAudioDB, KyraDB
extension.summary: Agrega automáticamente ilustraciones adicionales para sus medios.
extension.description: Artwork Beef agrega automáticamente ilustraciones adicionales para Series TV y Películas a su biblioteca. Las ilustraciones son agregadas desde Servicios web y el Sistema de archivos local.
extension.disclaimer: Fuente para ilustraciones: fanart.tv, TheTVDB.com, The Movie Database, TheAudioDB, KyraDB
extension.news:
v0.28.5 (2020-11-26) - fix: really really treat 403 as 404 and replace it
v0.28.4 (2020-11-21) - fix: 403 change causing errors with other web service issues
v0.28.1 - v0.28.3 - fix: treat 403 as 404 and replace it - fix: don't throw an error when a movie set is lost - Fix: avoid adding duplicate fanart from TVDB - Fix: log full URL when download fails - Fix: remove KyraDB
v0.28.0 (2020-02-08) - Feature: Add "Path exclusion" settings to skip processing media items by path

extension.summary: Last.FM Playlist Generator (Partymode)
extension.description: Create smart playlists with the help of Last.FM

extension.summary: Metadata and artwork from common sources like TMDB, IMDB, TADB, OMDB and fanart.tv
Metadatos e ilustraciones de fuentes comunes como TMDB, IMDB, TADB, OMDB y fanart.tv
extension.description: The metadata and artwork module for Kodi provides rich metadata, including artwork for various metatypes by scraping (and caching) this information from sites like TMDB, musicbrainz and fanart.tv. This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

El módulo de metadatos e ilustraciones para Kodi proporciona metadatos enriquecidos, que incluyen ilustraciones paravarios metatipos al raspar (y almacenar en caché) esta información se extrae de sitios como TMDB, musicbrainz and fanart.tv.[CR][CR]Este producto utiliza la API de TMDb pero no está avalado ni certificado por TMDb

extension.description: Сваля информация за предстоящите ТВ сериали. Вече никога няма да пропускате епизод от ТВ сериали, които следите.
Agafar informació de les sèries de TV que es retransmetran pròximament. No te'n perdràs cap mai més.

TV Show Next Aired liefert Termin-Informationen über die anstehenden Episoden der Serien aus der Datenbank. Dazu gibt es eine Wochenansicht mit allen in der nächsten Woche laufenden Episoden sowie (bei vorhandenem Skin Support) die direkte Integration der Informationen in die Ansichten des jeweiligen Skins. Sie werden nie wieder eine Folge verpassen.
Λήψη πληροφοριών για την Επόμενη Προβολή των Τηλ. Σειρών. Δε θα ξαναχάσετε επεισόδιο ποτέ.
Get info for TV Shows Next Aired. You'll never miss one again.
Get info for TV Shows Next Aired. You'll never miss one again.
Get info for TV Shows Next Aired. You'll never miss one again.
Obtener información de las siguientes emisiones de series. Nunca te perderás una de nuevo.
Obtener información de las siguientes emisiones de series. Nunca te perderás una de nuevo.
Ce script interroge votre médiathèque puis vas récupérer les infos sur les prochaines diffusions de vos séries. vous n'en manquerez plus aucune.
Obtenir les infos de prochaine diffusion des séries télé. Vous n'en manquerez plus jamais une.
Obter a info. das Seguintes Emisións das Series de TV. Non esquecerá ningunha.

Információ a sorozatok következő vetítési idejéről. Soha nem marad le mégegyszer semmiről.
Ottieni info per le Serie TV trasmesse prossimamente. Non ne perderai più una.

Gauti TV laidos kitos transliacijos informaciją. Jūs niekada daugiau jos nepraleisite.
Ophalen info voor komende TV shows. Je zult ze nooit meer missen.
Få informasjon om neste TV-sending. Du vil aldri gå glipp av en episode igjen.
Pobieraj informacje o odcinkach seriali wkrótce na antenie. Nigdy już żadnego nie przegapisz.
Obter info para Próximas Exibições de Séries TV. Nunca mais vai perder uma.
Saiba sobre próximas exibições de séries de TV. Você nunca perderá um episódio.
Află despre emisiuni care urmează să fie difuzate. Nu vei mai rata nici una.
Получает информацию о следующих ТВ передачах. Теперь Вы никогда не пропустите ни одну ТВ передачу.
Pridobi informacije TV oddaj ki se bodo predvajale. Nikoli več ne boste zamudili nobene epizode.
Hämta info för nästa sändning av TV-Serie. Du kommer inte att missa en igen.
获取即将播出的剧集的信息。你不会再错过好节目了。

extension.summary: Обликът "Titan MOD for Kodi" за MediaPortal адаптиран за Kodi, с много добавени функции.
MediaPortal's "Titan MOD for Kodi" Skin portiert für Kodi mit jeder Menge neuer Funktionen und einer vollständigen MediaBrowser Integration.
"Titan MOD for Kodi" skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
MediaPortal's "Titan MOD for Kodi" skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
MediaPortal's "Titan MOD for Kodi" skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
MediaPortal's "Titan MOD for Kodi" skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
El skin "Titan MOD for Kodi" de MediaPortal, portado a Kodi y enriquecido con muchas funciones.
Perustuu MediaPortalin "Titan MOD for Kodi"-ulkoasuun.
L'habillage "Titan MOD for Kodi" de MediaPortal adapté à Kodi et enrichi avec de nombreuses fonctionnalités
המעטפת "Titan MOD for Kodi" שבמקור נוצרה עבור MediaPortal, שודרגה ביכולות רבות ושילוב מלא של MediaBrowser.
MediaPortal "Titan MOD for Kodi" presvlaka prebačena na Kodi i obogaćena s puno dodatnih mogućnosti.
La skin di MediaPortal "Titan MOD for Kodi" arriva su Kodi arricchita con molte feature e piena integrazione di MediaBrowser
MediaPortal'o "Titan MOD for Kodi" teminė išvaizda perkelta į Kodi ir papildyta daugybe funkcijų bei pilna MediaBrowser integracija.
Kulit "Titan MOD for Kodi" MediaPortal diport ke Kodi ditambahbaik dengan pelbagai fitur.
De "Titan MOD for Kodi" skin van MediaPortal is geconverteerd naar Kodi en verrijkt met talloze functionaliteiten
Skóra "Titan MOD for Kodi" przeniesiona z programu MediaPortal do Kodi wzbogacona o dodatkowe funkcje.
A skin "Titan MOD for Kodi" portada do MediaPortal para o Kodi foi enriquecida com várias funcionalidades.
Обложка "Titan MOD for Kodi" была портирована с MediaPortal на Kodi и обзавелась множеством новых возможностей
"Titan MOD for Kodi" маска MediaPortala портована за Kodi обогаћена са доста карактеристика.
"Titan MOD for Kodi" maska MediaPortala portovana za Kodi obogaćena sa dosta karakteristika.
MediaPortal'ın "Titan MOD for Kodi" dış görünümü, pek çok özellikle zenginleştirilerek Kodi'ye aktarıldı.
MediaPortal's "Titan MOD for Kodi" 皮肤富含大量的功能。
extension.news: Follow the forum thread about the latest news for the skin.
